This should ensure  that the following stylesheet processing instruction is honored by  these new browser versions. For some more background you might want  to visit the following bug report:  https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=338621  --> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="/WebResource.axd?d=OG6ICBS3XdykvyL_wBngEtwfPZ1xqVL3SJbFznhjfEgbO7QCYjHbDfgdgnO_5IYl31FcIeZ2u_qHqs8zCgU_y6DDpKxLyAV4MxNJVxfxbqAA9wnJHfwytgbvEYfRnFp2CKySbJEfaqzaXNpSNK6oTGhGshY1&t=635319500310794128" media="screen"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/">   <title>Natural Sciences</title>   <subtitle>The Natural Sciences programme offers flexible BSc and MSci degrees which allow you to study three different but complementary subjects in the first year, with greater specialisation as the course progresses.</subtitle>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/naturalsciences.aspx?RelatedItemsasStandardList_SyndicationType=2" />   <generator>Contensis: http://www.contentmanagement.co.uk</generator>   <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/naturalsciences.aspx?SyndicationType=2</id>   <updated>2015-03-06T09:01:18Z</updated>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/naturalsciences.aspx?SyndicationType=2" rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" />   <entry>     <title>Natural Sciences BSc</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/bsc-natural-sciences.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Paul Gelsthorpe</name>     </author>     <summary>The three-year BSc in Natural Sciences is an interdisciplinary degree which allows you to study more than one science subject throughout your course. The 15 three-subject pathways available in the first year will enable you to find out what your A level subjects are like at degree level before you specialise further.</summary>     <published>2011-07-13T17:57:00Z</published>     <updated>2014-07-29T09:29:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/bsc-natural-sciences.aspx</id>   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Natural Sciences MSci</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/msci-natural-sciences.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Paul Gelsthorpe</name>     </author>     <summary>The four-year MSci in Natural Sciences is an interdisciplinary science degree which allows students to study more than one science subject as part of their degree and gradually specialise over the course of their degree to one subject in their final year.</summary>     <published>2011-07-13T17:57:00Z</published>     <updated>2014-07-29T09:30:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/naturalsciences/msci-natural-sciences.aspx</id>   </entry> </feed>
